help.desc: Get informations about a command. You can enter app name after help command (php core/manager help app)

cache.desc:
Manage iumio cache  
        --clear : Clear cache environment (Dev environment as default)  
        --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, ALL) (must used with --clear)

assets.desc:
Manage project assets 
        --copy : Copy project assets to web directory  
        --symlink (must with --copy option) Symbolic link will be created 
        --clear : clear all web assets 
        --appname : App name 'Example --appname=DefaultApp' (must be use with --copy or --clear option)       
        --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, ALL)

app.desc:
Manage project 
        create : Create project  
        enabled : Enabled an app 
         disabled : Disabled an app 
       remove : Remove a project

routing.desc:
Manage Routing of all project 
        build jsrouting : Build the JS Routing file (Add option --baseapp to build Js Routing for base app)

autoloader.desc:
Manage the class map for engine autoloader 
        --clear : Clear autoloader class map for a specific environment (Dev environment as default)  
        --build : Build autoloader class map for a specific environment (Dev environment as default)  
        --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, ALL) (must used with --clear or --build)

deployer.desc:
Deploy or undeploy your(s) application(s) 
        process-deploy : Process the deployment to production environment  
        process-undeploy : Undeploy your(s) application(s) (switch to dev)

compiled.desc:
Manage iumio compilation directory  
        --clear : Clear compiled environment (Dev environment as default)  
        --env: Environment name (DEV, PROD, ALL) (must used with --clear)
